scripts.build:goerli: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum build:goerli && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise build:goerli && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/uniswap-v3 build:goerli
scripts.deploy:goerli: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum deploy:goerli && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise deploy:goerli && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/uniswap-v3 deploy:goerli
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum build:mainnet && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise build:mainnet && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/uniswap-v3 build:mainnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum deploy:mainnet && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise deploy:mainnet && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/uniswap-v3 deploy:mainnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet:local: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum deploy:mainnet:local && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise deploy:mainnet:local && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/uniswap-v3 deploy:mainnet:local
scripts.build:gnosis: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum build:gnosis && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise build:gnosis
scripts.deploy:gnosis: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum deploy:gnosis && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise deploy:gnosis
scripts.deploy:gnosis:local: npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/ethereum deploy:gnosis:local && npm run --prefix=./subgraphs/stakewise deploy:gnosis:local
